DeviceTemperatureConfiguration

class st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.DeviceTemperatureConfiguration
ID: number

0x0002 the ID of this cluster

NAME: str

“DeviceTemperatureConfiguration” the name of this cluster

attributes: st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.DeviceTemperatureConfigurationServerAttributes or st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.DeviceTemperatureConfigurationClientAttributes
commands: st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.DeviceTemperatureConfigurationServerCommands or st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.DeviceTemperatureConfigurationClientCommands
types: st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.DeviceTemperatureConfigurationTypes

st.zigbee.ZigbeeMessageTx

configure_reporting(device, min_rep_int, max_rep_int, rep_change)

Construct a st.zigbee.ZigbeeMessageTx to configure this attribute for reporting on a device

Parameters

  • device (st.zigbee.Device) –

  • min_rep_int (number or st.zigbee.data_types.Uint16) – the minimum interval allowed between reports of this attribute

  • max_rep_int (number or st.zigbee.data_types.Uint16) – the maximum interval allowed between reports of this attribute

  • rep_change (st.zigbee.data_types.Int16) – The amount of change of the attribute to trigger a report

Returns

containing a ConfigureReporting body

Return type

class st.zigbee.zcl.clusters.DeviceTemperatureConfiguration.DeviceTempAlarmMask
ID: number

0x0010 the ID of this attribute

NAME: str

“DeviceTempAlarmMask” the name of this attribute

data_type: st.zigbee.data_types.Bitmap8

the data type of this attribute

DEVICE_TEMPERATURE_TOO_LOW: number

1

DEVICE_TEMPERATURE_TOO_HIGH: number

2

is_device_temperature_too_low_set()
Returns

True if the value of DEVICE_TEMPERATURE_TOO_LOW is non-zero

Return type

boolean

set_device_temperature_too_low()

Set the value of the bit in the DEVICE_TEMPERATURE_TOO_LOW field to 1

unset_device_temperature_too_low()

Set the value of the bits in the DEVICE_TEMPERATURE_TOO_LOW field to 0

is_device_temperature_too_high_set()
Returns

True if the value of DEVICE_TEMPERATURE_TOO_HIGH is non-zero

Return type

boolean

set_device_temperature_too_high()

Set the value of the bit in the DEVICE_TEMPERATURE_TOO_HIGH field to 1

unset_device_temperature_too_high()

Set the value of the bits in the DEVICE_TEMPERATURE_TOO_HIGH field to 0

augment_type(base_type_obj)

Add additional functionality to the base type object

Parameters

base_type_obj (st.zigbee.data_types.Bitmap8) – the base data type object to add functionality to
